plugins.name: Skew
plugins.description: A fun, little, free, and useful plugin that allows you to skew objects in Figma with precise control over horizontal and vertical skewing, plus an additional flattening transformation.FeaturesHorizontal Skew: -75° to +75° rangeVertical Skew: -75° to +75° rangeFlattening: -100% to +100% range for compressing or expanding along the skewed axisReal-time Preview: See how your transformations will look before applying themPrecision ControlsUse arrow keys in the input fields for 1° incrementsHold Shift + arrows for 0.1° incrementsHold Cmd+Shift + arrows for 0.01° incrementsDirect decimal input supported up to 2 decimal placesBasic SkewingSelect one or more objects you want to skew.Adjust the horizontal and vertical skew sliders.The transformation happens in real-time, allowing you toMove objects around to check alignment.Select additional objects to apply the same skew.Fine-tune values using keyboard controls or direct input.See changes before applyingThe plugin operates in two modesInteractive Mode (Before pressing Apply)Any selected object will immediately transform to match the current slider values.Applied State (After pressing Apply)Pressing the "Apply Skew" button commits the current transformation.The sliders reset to 0.The transformed state becomes the new baseline for the object.This is helpful before using the Flatten feature.FlatteningFirst, skew your object to the desired angle.Press "Apply Skew" to commit the transformation.Use the Flatten slider to compress (-100% to 0%) or expand (0% to +100%) the shape along its skewed axis.Compatible ObjectsThe plugin works with:RectanglesEllipsesPolygonsVector objectsFramesGroupsComponentsSectionsText (will be converted to outlines)Boolean operationsAuto-layout framesTipsWork Non-Destructively:Keep the plugin open while experimenting with transformations.Be aware that it applies set values directly on any object.Use the real-time preview to perfect your angles before applying.Move you object around to line it up perfectlyIf you use reference objects, lock them to avoid applying skewing to them.Apply Before Flattening:Press "Apply Skew" before using the Flatten slider.This ensures the flattening happens relative to the skewed shape.Multiple Objects:Select multiple objects to apply the same transformation.Useful for maintaining consistent angles across elements.Vector Quality:The preview might appear pixelated during transformation.The final result will be sharp vector quality after applying.More Tips:Use small increments via keyboard hotkeys for precise control.The preview window helps visualize the transformation before committing.If you make a mistake, set all sliders to 0 to reset to the original state.For complex compositions, apply transformations in stages using the Apply button.Technical NotesTransformations are applied using matrix calculations to ensure accurate results.The plugin maintains the object's center point during transformation.Vector paths are recalculated after applying to ensure sharp rendering.
plugins.tagline: Skew anything. Horizontally. Vertically. And flatten it. In real time.

plugins.name: PageClone | A Better Page-Cloning Utility
plugins.description: One-click, fuss-free tool to clone a page.NOTE: Cloning might take up to 20min for a complex frame.How to Use:• Launch the plugin• While the plugin is active, you are free to move between pages• Click on the plugin again once you're on the page you want to clone• Verify that the "Current Page" name is reflected on the plugin UI• Select the frames you want to clone‣ Includes select/deselect all capability‣ Pro-tip: you can pre-select the frames you want to clone before launching the plugin• Choose a destination page, or select New Page and name the page to be created• Options available:‣ Detach instances- Useful if changes on original file should not affect cloned file‣ Overwrite existing frames with the same name (if you choose to clone to an existing page)‣ Remove hidden layers‣ Automatically lock all frames• Finally, click on "Clone" and let the plugin do the rest!Note:• If your frames are complex, considering cloning a maximum of 5 frames at a time.Work-in-Progress:• Suggestions are welcome :)

accepted.name: Stevanus Satria
accepted.description: Tweak . Tune . Tinker

plugins.name: borderless-export
plugins.description: Figma Borderless Export 🛹🚫Sometimes we get a white border on the edges of the image when exporting images on figma.This plugin solves that problem!✨ FeaturesExport images without borders with the following options.- Extension: [PNG, JPG]- Scale: [0.5x, 0.75x, 1x, 1.5x, 2x, 3x, 4x]🛠️ How to useInstall the pluginSelect the frames you want to exportplugin → Borderless ExportExport with UI (with full options)Export as PNG 1x, 1.5x, 2xExport as JPG 1x, 1.5x, 2x (beta)📝 NoteThere are two main causes of strange borders when exporting with figma.When the width/height of the export target is a non-integer values due to scaled export (ex. 0.75x, 1.5x, ...)when the target frame is not on a grid point on figmaThis plugin solves both cases in most cases.JPG exports rarely leave borders, which can be solved by changing to PNG export or moving the image to a grid point.We plan to improve the algorithm for border detection in the future.Github repository is here.
plugins.tagline: Export images without strange borders 🧙

70888.name: borderless-export
70888.description: Figma Borderless Export 🛹🚫Sometimes we get a white border on the edges of the image when exporting images on figma.This plugin solves that problem!✨ FeaturesExport images without borders with the following options.- Extension: [PNG, JPG]- Scale: [0.5x, 0.75x, 1x, 1.5x, 2x, 3x, 4x]🛠️ How to useInstall the pluginSelect the frames you want to exportplugin → Borderless ExportExport with UI (with full options)Export as PNG 1x, 1.5x, 2xExport as JPG 1x, 1.5x, 2x (beta)📝 NoteThere are two main causes of strange borders when exporting with figma.When the width/height of the export target is a non-integer values due to scaled export (ex. 0.75x, 1.5x, ...)when the target frame is not on a grid point on figmaThis plugin solves both cases in most cases.JPG exports rarely leave borders, which can be solved by changing to PNG export or moving the image to a grid point.We plan to improve the algorithm for border detection in the future.Github repository is here.

plugins.name: Theme Importer for Visual Studio Code
plugins.description: How to useSelect the built-in Visual Studio Code themes you would like to import as Figma variables and press the `Import` button. Theme tokens can be previewed in the left hand pane in either list or grid views.How to add a custom Visual Studio Code theme to the pluginOpen Visual Studio Code.Install the desired color theme and switch to the theme in Visual Studio Code.Press Ctrl+Shift+P and run Developer: Generate Color Theme from current settings.Select the file's contents and copy.Open the Figma plugin and press the Create a new theme button.Paste into the Create a new theme dialog and press Save.Note: This plugin supports up to 10 custom themes.

plugins.name: Complex Themes
plugins.description: Figma plugin for styling and painting your layouts with different color themes.Provides additional options for managing and editing styles in your layout, as well as a new method of organizing them for working with projects that are unified in different styles.The plugin also allows you to work with theme schemas in json, with the ability to import and export them, which can also be convenient for developers to work with styles and their communication with designers.Sample of usingSample mockupWhat does plugin do- Styles- Themes- Create new theme- Duplicate existing theme- Remove theme- Create theme with styles from selected layers (it groups same styles, and allows you to adapt existing mockups for subsequent adaptation to themes)- Styles group- Duplicate styles group- Remove styles group- Styles- Search styles- Rename style, move to another theme or group- Select all nodes with style (double click on style preview circle in list)- Edit style- Simple color picker for solid colors- Simple gradient picker for create gradient (unstable!)- Redrawer- Nested redraw selected nodes with entries- Redraw one of selected nodes- Redraw all selected nodes- Redraw supported for- Stroke paint styles- Fill paint styles- Text styles (but at the moment, only a named style template can be created in the plugin, you cannot change it in the plugin - use figma tools)- Library- Store your themes and apply it to new mockup- Download serialized json of theme (can be useful for example to give to the programmer necessary variables for all components)How it works?The core feature of this plugin is redrawer. It works based on style naming conventions: GroupName[theme_name]/StyleName or Button[light]/PrimaryThe core concept of this convention I'm took from Appearance Plugin.But this approach is not native to figma, and therefore adding each such style manually - is rather annoying and time-consuming, so the plugin has its own style and theme editor to simplify the naming process and quickly insert the desired styles.This is convenient because you can work with one target layout, and then simply duplicate the existing theme, and replace the necessary styles - so you can quickly create a new layout variation.Is it stable?This is an alpha release, it implements the basic concept of working with themes, styles, redrawing. Most of them work stably, but this is not a polished version of the plugin, so in case of any errors and problems, the best option is either to restart the plugin or roll back certain changes in the layout using `Ctrl+Z`.At Now the plugin is at the stage of polishing, and this version is intended primarily for enthusiasts to check it in battle, and collect feedback (you can leave issues on github, or write to the mail)Planned improvementsCreate detailed tutorial videoFix reaction bugs in ui side of pluginAdding some validatorsAdding simple text style editorAdding style guides generatorSource Code

plugins.name: F2C - Figma to Code: React, RN, Vue, HTML YY D2C 研发工具
plugins.description: 由YY直播的互动团队和YDC团队打造的Figma生态插件功能代码生成。支持React ，React Navie, 鸿蒙， Taro，Vue等设计稿代码直出代码优化。通过图层标记实现代码变量预埋，代码列表循环结构，代码分块等功能设计标注工具。支持查看设计标注，一键切图等组件支持。提供一套开箱即用、可被D2C识别且与代码严格对齐的组件标记工具，并支持标记第三方组件库图像上传（仅内部）。支持内部业务自定义图片上传接口如何使用安装插件选择图层并开始转码。 （如果没有编辑权限，可以使用Figma【复制到我的草稿】功能）安装 F2C-VSCode插件选择图层, 点击【生成】更多教程请查看官网使用提示为了更好的布局效果，请遵循设计规范可以开启AI智能命名以获得更好的CSS类名命名(仅内部)高阶用法标记组件库。使用插件标记组件或组件集，实现第三方组件库的D2C识别。图层打Tag。将图层打上不同特征标记以获得不同的代码效果。实验性MaskGroup, Drop shadow包裹的内容会转化为图片，Drop shadow提供实验性选项保留CSS属性更多教程请查看官网：f2c.yy.com

plugins.name: Frame Wave
plugins.description: Frame Wave is a powerful tool crafted to streamline the process of duplicating frames across multiple device widths.This plugin is especially useful for designers who need to test their designs on different screen sizes, ensuring responsiveness and consistency.Key FeaturesMulti-Device Duplication: With a simple click, duplicate your selected frame to fit a variety of device widths, automatically resizing it to match the screen sizes you’ve chosen.Bulk Selection: Save time by using the 'Select All' feature for both iPhone and Android device options, allowing you to quickly apply actions across multiple devices.Dynamic Status Updates: Always stay informed with the real-time status text that displays the currently selected frame's name. If no frame is selected, it conveniently shows 'none'.Easy-to-Use Interface: The plugin integrates seamlessly with Figma, providing a user-friendly interface with clear, intuitive controls.How to UseInstall the Plugin: Add the Frame Duplicator plugin to your Figma workspace.Open Your Project: Navigate to the Figma file you wish to work on.Select a Frame: Click on the frame you want to duplicate. The plugin will display the selected frame name.Choose Devices: Check the boxes corresponding to the device widths you need or use the 'Select All' option for bulk selection.Generate Frames: Once a frame is selected and at least one device width is chosen, the 'Generate Frames' button will be enabled. Click it to duplicate the frame across the selected device widths.View Results: Check your Figma canvas to see the duplicated frames, perfectly resized to the device specifications.
plugins.tagline: Quickly duplicate frames and test your app designs across multiple device widths with Frame Wave.

plugins.name: Treejack / Tree-test ~ Effortless Information Architecture Testing
plugins.description: Test and refine your website’s information architecture effortlessly. Integrated directly into your Figma workflow.Getting Started: 3 Simple StepsStep 1: Create or Import Your Menu StructureBegin by setting up your information architecture. You can either create a new menu structure from scratch or import an existing one into the plugin.Step 2: Create Tasks and Attach Menu to ItDefine specific tasks that you want users to perform. Attach your created or imported menu structure to these tasks to simulate real-world navigation scenarios.Step 3: Setup a TestSet up your tree-test by configuring the parameters and options. Once everything is in place, initiate the test to gather valuable insights on your information architecture.Features:Easy Setup: Quickly create and set up tree tests.Customizable Tasks: Define specific tasks for users to perform during tests.Detailed Reporting: Generate detailed reports on user behavior and task completion.Interactive Visualization: Visualize navigation paths and user choices interactively.Multi-Project Support: Manage and test multiple projects within Figma.Exportable Data: Export test data for further analysis and presentation.Here's how you can contribute: A quick and easy way to show your appreciation for plugin is by buying me a coffee.https://www.buymeacoffee.com/lucksy

plugins.name: Figma to Shopify with Replo - AI Enabled Landing Page Builder
plugins.description: Turn your Figma designs into desktop and mobile responsive Shopify pages with Replo’s Figma to Shopify plugin by Replo. Copy and paste your pages and sections in Figma to a landing page, PDP, or section in Shopify with Replo - no code needed and optimized for page load speeds out of the box, with support for non-autolayout frames and AI-driven mobile optimization.How to use the plugin:Create an account at https://dashboard.replo.app/ if you don't already have oneOpen the Figma to Shopify Plugin through the Figma menu bar inside your design fileSelect and copy your section or page in Figma & paste it directly into ReploOptimize your design for mobile with the help of Replo AIEdit your pasted-in elements to add functionality and pull dynamic data from your Shopify storePublish your pages!Key Features:Seamless Conversion: Effortlessly convert Figma auto-layout frames to Replo.Intuitive UI: Experience a user-friendly interface with clear progress indicators during import.AI-Driven Responsive Optimization: Automatically optimize pages for mobile using AI.Font Management: Automatically identify necessary fonts to Replo and upload with a single click.Advanced Page Conversion: Convert non-autolayout frames to Replo with ease.AI Image Alt Text Generation: After the pages are loaded into Replo, our AI alt text generator helps optimize your images and landing pages for SEO.Work-in-progressAI Dynamic Data Mapping: Identify products, carousels, and more, and seamlessly map dynamic data to Shopify products and collections.SupportThis is the link to the plugin support article. We’re also available 24/7 at support@replo.app - if you have any issues, let us know!

plugins.name: Xcode color asset exporter
plugins.description: Export figma color styles to Xcode Color Assets easilyAlso supports dark appearance colors 🌙.NOTE: It doesn't support gradient colors like Xcode does.How to use?1. Prepare for exportRename your color styles with tag wrapped with brackets if you have a dark appearance color.If you don't get the dark appearance color or if the color doesn't make a pair, this plugin will turn it into an universal asset.NOTE: It doesn't matter what the tag name is, but the tag name has to be same as the others.e.g- BackgroundColor [day]- BackgroundColor [night]or- BackgroundColor [light]- BackgroundColor [dark]2. Run the plugin in FigmaFill out the tag names with your tag names or just leave them empty if you're using tag names by default [day], [night].3. CreatePress create button to download colors.zip file4. Use in XcodeUnzip colors.zip file.Drag and drop colors folder in your Xcode Assets tab or copy and paste in Assets.xcassets folder directly.5. Enjoy your time ☕️Boom! Now you're ready to use color assets in your Xcode ProjectHow it works?Each folder includes Contents.json which contains folder information.And each YourColorName.colorset folder includes Contents.json which contains color information.So the Xcode could understand where the folder is and what the color is.This plugin is open sourced project in Github.Feel free to pull request!
plugins.tagline: Easy to export color styles as Xcode color assets. (Multi appearance also supported)

plugins.name: Color Cosmic
plugins.description: Intuitive Gradient Enhancement ToolThis Figma plugin provides an intuitive way to enhance your designs with stunning gradients instantly.Key FeaturesInstant Beautiful GradientsWith a single click, you can apply any gradient from a carefully curated library, transforming the aesthetic appeal of your work.Preview and Adjustment FeatureThe plugin also provides a unique feature of previewing and adjusting the direction of the gradient. Whether you want to set a specific angle for linear gradients or reorient them to suit your design's perspective, it's as simple as selecting an option.Why Use This Plugin?Efficient WorkflowSeamlessly integrated into Figma, this plugin streamlines your workflow by eliminating the need for manual gradient adjustments.Seamless Integration with FigmaThis plugin is seamlessly integrated into Figma.Suitable for All DesignersThis plugin is an essential tool for both experienced designers and beginners alike.🇯🇵Translate in Japanese↓↓↓直感的なグラデーション強化ツールこのFigmaプラグインは、あなたのデザインを一瞬で美しく変えることができます。選りすぐりのライブラリから任意のグラデーションを適用することができます。主な特徴一瞬で美しいグラデーション一つのクリックで、あなたのデザインに美しいグラデーションを追加します。プレビューと調整機能グラデーションの方向をプレビューし、調整することができます。リニアグラデーションの特定の角度を設定したり、デザインの視点に合わせて再配置することが可能です。なぜこのプラグインを使うべきか？効率的なワークフロー手動でのグラデーション調整の必要性を排除し、あなたのワークフローを合理化します。Figmaとのシームレスな統合このプラグインはFigmaにシームレスに統合されています。全てのデザイナーに適しています経験豊富なデザイナーから初心者まで、このプラグインはあなたのデザインを一段と引き立てます。

plugins.name: Mupixa
plugins.description: 🦸 Super powers for designersTransform your designs into dynamic, engaging experiences with just a few clicks. Share your creations effortlessly through a simple link, opening up a world of possibilities for collaboration, research and insights gathering.✨ Interactive PrototypesConvert your designs into fully functional prototypes that look and feel like native apps, perfect for usability testing and stakeholder presentations.✨ Dynamic PresentationsShare captivating slideshows that track viewer engagement, allowing you to identify which slides resonate most with your audience.✨ Augmented Reality (AR) ExperiencesCreate immersive AR interactions that bring your designs into the real world, offering a cutting-edge way to showcase your work directly on client devices.✨ Comprehensive ResearchConduct in-depth usability tests, launch market research surveys, and gather valuable feedback directly through your prototypes.🚀 Analytics for Designs💎  Heatmaps (hover, click/tap, rage etc.)💎 Interaction flows💎 Session replays💎 Emotion recognition💎 Integrated dynamic surveys💎 A/B Testing💎 Branded QR Codes💎 and much more ...Demo Prototype:https://app.mupixa.com/demo/prototypeDemo AR (use Android:Chrome / iPhone:WebXR Viewer):https://app.mupixa.com/ardemoDemo Analytics:https://app.mupixa.com/demo/analyse🧐 Don’t You Have an Account Yet? ❗A Mupixa.com account is required to use the plugin.❗No worries! Register now for Free!https://app.mupixa.com/signup🤔 How Does It Work1. Open your Figma project;2. Open the Mupixa plugin (the first time the plugin is used it will redirect you to mupixa.com to login using your Mupixa credentials);3. Publish your project;4. Open the newly created project and define test scenarios;5. Generate links or QR codes to share your prototype;6. Evaluate collected analytics;ℹ️ The plugin will upload all assets from the project and the following interactions if available:Supported triggers:- On Click;- Mouse Down;Supported actions:- Back;- Navigate To;ℹ️ Each publish will create a new Mupixa project.
